candidates.title: Move from String to BString
candidates.body:
Non ascii characters weren't correctly converted from `[u8]` to `str` to deal with non utf-8 data. Using the [bstr](https://docs.rs/bstr/latest/bstr/)  crate allows to still accept arbitrary bytes and also handles utf-8.

Closes #195

candidates.title: refactor: switch from buf_redux to buffer-redux
feat: update to latest dependencies
candidates.body:
- bumps MSRV to 1.65
- new versions of crypto deps
- base64@0.21

candidates.title: Update nom
candidates.body:
Upgrade from nom 4 to nom 7.

Done from scratch rather than using #140 as the rebase was ugly.

# TODO
- [x] cleanup some functions
- [x] cleanup commits / commit messages

candidates.title: fix: update to new chrono apis & happy clippy
ECDSA support
candidates.body: This PR provides support for ECDSA signatures. Only P256 and P384 are supported for now.

candidates.title: update to RSA 0.7.0 interfaces
candidates.body:
This depends on https://github.com/RustCrypto/RSA/pull/195 and needs updated md5 and ripemd crates to provide OIDs

Note: it might be simpler to just restore the rsa::Hash struct in the RSA crate.

candidates.title: Remove unused circular dependency and also rewrite IV handling to not require lazy_static
candidates.body: The old code was taking a copy of IV. Instead, we can just use `GenericArray::from` to convert the `u8` array into a `GenericArray`. This approach has the same cost (for the copy) without the need for `lazy_static`.

candidates.title: Remove unused clear_on_drop dependency
candidates.body: `clear_on_drop` seems to be completely replaced by `#[zeroize(drop)]`.

candidates.title: feat: edition 2021 and update crypto deps
